page.title: 16CUSTOMS
page.content: {QUEEN FOR A DAY}- The gala started in 1934.It is a ceremony where a 'Queen' is ceremoniously crowned.Her Consort and court like her are chosen from local schools.In earlier years places were decided by merit,now names are drawn from a hat.Local bands joined the parade and school children used to march through the streets.The gala was the main event of the year for many children.Nowadays the gala heralds the beginning of a civic week. {CARTER LAD AND LASS -}The Carter Lad and Lass are elected from young people over 18 and of 'good character'The ceremony takes the form of a ride-out round the original borders of TRANENT parish followed by a 'kirking' at the old Parish Church.The ceremony dates back 200yrs.They also represent TRANENT at all the BORDER rides and at the Musselburgh Honest Lad & Lass ride
